ygData.subject: RE: Magical attack for a bard.
ygData.msgSnippet: You can damage them with your songs, and at level 10 chords plus punching with magical gloves will do fairly good damage.  By twisting Chords and Hymn you
ygData.messageBody:
You can damage them with your songs, and at level 10 chords plus punching
with magical gloves will do fairly good damage. By twisting Chords and Hymn
you could probably beat some of the lower level wisps fairly easily with a
lute. For easy magical gloves I would suggest running to Lower guk, scary
but if you are not agnostic and have not killed any frogloks you will be
ignored and can wait at the zone line for someone to get some near there
safely. Another possibility is woven/mesh/netted gloves. All are magical
and cheap now that monks have Gauntlet of Wu to acquire.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 3:51 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Magical attack for a bard.


From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

I was given a lambent stone and am thinking about getting a
Darkwood staff with it. I am level 10 and a magical weapon
would allow me to kill wisps while I can get experience off
of them!!! :)

Also, since a magical instrument still seems a ways away.
Will my damage songs damage the wisps without one?
HOw about if I have magical gloves and not magical instrument
Anything?

Thanks for the help!

Faesong, level 10 Songweaver of Solusek Ro (How's THAT for a combination,
anyway!), Test Server

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
